tool_description: Creates customizable budget templates with predefined income and expense categories, allowing users to establish a foundation for their personal budget planning.

budget_period.description: Budget period: monthly, quarterly, or yearly

template_type.description: Template type: basic, detailed, or custom

error_messages: Invalid template name: Template name must be 1-50 characters and contain only letters, numbers, spaces, and hyphens.
Invalid budget period: Use one of [monthly, quarterly, yearly].
Invalid template type: Use one of [basic, detailed, custom].
usage: Provide template_name and budget_period, optionally specify template_type. The tool creates a structured budget template with default categories that can be customized later.

template_id.description: Unique identifier for the created template

default_income_categories.description: List of default income category names

default_expense_categories.description: List of default expense category names

creation_date.description: Template creation timestamp in ISO 8601 format
